definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: †[[לוּלֵא]] Ge 43:10, Ju Jdg 14:18, 2Sa 2:27, Ps 2:13, elsewhere [[לוּלֵי]]:10 if not, unless (fr. [[לוּ]] if, and [[לֵא]], by dissim. (Kö:ii. 236, 489) for [[לאׁ]] not; cf. Ar. lawla0), the neg. of [[לוּ]], and used similarly:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. pf., Ju Jdg 14:18 [[לא מחאתם לולא]] …[[חרשׁתם ]] unless ye had ploughed with my heifer, ye would not have found out my riddle, 1Sa 25:34 (second [[כי]] resumptive: [[כִּי]]

definitions.title: 1 d
definitions.body: ), Ps 106:23; with apod, introd. by [[כִּי עַתָּה]] Ge 31:42, Ge 43:10; by [[אָז]] 2Sa 2:27 ([[כי]] resumptive); by [[כִּמְעַט]] Is 1:9; with an aposiop. Ps 27:13 if I had not believed ...!

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. impf. De 32:27 [[לולי אגור]] …[[אמרתי ]] I should have said, &c .…except I dreaded, &c.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: without a verb, Ps 94:17 (apod. [[כמעט]]), Ps 119:92 (apod. [[אָז]]). In the later language, Ps 124:1, Ps 124:2 -[[שֶׁ]] ´[[לוּלֵי י]] (apod. [[אֲזַי]] except that ... (cf. Aram., 0eluw lo0...d Ps 106:23, [[דִּי]] …[[אִילּוּלֵי ]] Ps 27:13 Targum).—Rd. also [[לוּלֵי]] for [[אוּלַי]] in Nu 22:33 (apod. [[כִּי עַתָּה]]). See further on [[לוּ]] and [[לוּלֵא]] Dr:§§ 139–145 Kö:iii. 487f; 565.
